extends java.lang.Object
implements ReactPackage
    This will eventually replace LazyReactPackage when TurboModules are finally done.

      • createNativeModules

        public java.util.List<NativeModule> createNativeModules(ReactApplicationContext reactContext)
        指定者:
        createNativeModules 在接口中 ReactPackage
        参数:
        reactContext - react application context that can be used to create modules
        返回:
        list of native modules to register with the newly created catalyst instance

      • getModule

        public abstract NativeModule getModule(java.lang.String name,
                                       ReactApplicationContext reactContext)
        The API needed for TurboModules. Given a module name, it returns an instance of NativeModule for the name
        参数:
        name -
        reactContext -
        返回:

      • getNativeModuleIterator

        public java.lang.Iterable<ModuleHolder> getNativeModuleIterator(ReactApplicationContext reactContext)
        This is a temporary method till we implement TurboModules. Once we implement TurboModules, we will be able to directly call getModule(String, ReactApplicationContext) This method will be removed when TurboModule implementation is complete
        参数:
        reactContext -
        返回:

      • getViewManagers

        protected java.util.List<ModuleSpec> getViewManagers(ReactApplicationContext reactContext)
        参数:
        reactContext - react application context that can be used to create View Managers.
        返回:
        list of module specs that can create the View Managers.
